attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Pensioners of London have the same living expenses as those still at work, who receive a London Weighting allowance, yet receive the same pension as them living outside the capital, they also face congestion charges, extra on Council tax to fund the Mayor's office, along with Olympic contributions, to which the rest of the country do not face, we are in a catch 22 with the policies of the exchequer, only to keep pace with inflation, while various taxes rise above that figure, but don’t contribute towards it.

rejection.details: In particular the 'title' of the petition must be a call to action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
